mapper.sql: itemid, clock, num, value_min, value_avg, value_max
mapper.insert:
insert into trends
itemid,
clock,
num,
value_min,
value_avg,
value_max,
#{itemid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{clock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{valueMin,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{valueAvg,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{valueMax,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update trends
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
value_min = #{valueMin,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
value_avg = #{valueAvg,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
value_max = #{valueMax,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where itemid = #{itemid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and clock = #{clock,jdbcType=INTEGER}
